Germany based dedicated Server Offers:
We offer dedicated servers in the Avaya Databurg Datacenter in Frankfurt Germany. We offer a comfortable tool to manage your server from inside our client area, you can reset, rescue, set RDNS and check traffic, block IP's and more. Our Germany based servers can be found here
